text:
PAIRIN | Software Engineer (Fullstack Ruby) | Denver | OnSite | Fulltime | https://www.pairin.com/careers/

PAIRIN is a social enterprise company whose mission is to make education relevant and hiring equitable. PAIRIN was founded on the belief that all people have amazing value, but most of us never realize our potential. People are too often put into ill-fitting boxes, told we can’t, won’t and will never be able to attain our dreams. Many people hear this so much they never even dream big, or pursue their goals as if they are truly attainable. At PAIRIN, this is something we want to change.
